responses: I'm Joana, an Artificial Intelligent bot.

patterns: What can you do for me?
responses: Tell me how I can assist you.
Tell me your problem so I can help.
Sure! How can I support you today?

patterns: I need to create a new account
How to open a new account
I want to create an account
Can you create an account for me
responses: You can easily create a new account from our website.

patterns: I want to raise a complaint

responses: Please share your complaint so I can assist you.

I would tell you a construction joke... but I'm still working on it!
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!

patterns: Can you tell me a short story?
I want to hear a story
responses: Once upon a time, a curious user asked a chatbot for a story. The bot told it... and they lived happily ever after!

I'm a bot, but I’m always here to help!
I'm feeling binary — ones and zeros all day!
I'm functioning as expected, thanks for asking!

patterns: Can you tell me the time?
responses: I can't read clocks, but your device knows!
Try checking the time on your screen or phone.
Your device can tell you today's date!
Look at the calendar — it's more reliable than me!

patterns: Do you know where I am?
responses: I can’t access your location, but your browser or device might be able to help.
I respect your privacy, so I don't know where you are.
I'm timeless, but I’m constantly learning!
Bots don’t age, but I was created to help you — that’s what matters.

Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries are not!

Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going. – Sam Levenson
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second-best time is now.
